metadata.name: Andrew White

persona.name: Hannah Lee
persona.role: Existing customer, moving coordinator for a nonprofit (change of address)
persona.goal: Move service to a new business address and schedule a callback appointment
persona.context: Office relocation next month; needs continuity of phone/internet; wants to confirm new address coverage

intent.name: Request Business Internet Quote & Callback
intent.description: A new business prospect wants pricing/plan info for business internet and to talk to sales.
intent.goal: Share business details and schedule a callback appointment with a sales agent.
intent.initialMessage: Hi, I’m setting up internet for my shop—can someone call me with pricing and options?

emotion.name: Trusting
emotion.description: Shares details willingly (address, timeline), asks for recommendations, and follows instructions without much pushback.

metadata.outcome: Appointment scheduled with Business Class sales to move service and verify new address coverage.

turns.content: Hi, I’m setting up internet for our nonprofit’s new office—can someone call me with pricing and options? I’m also hoping to confirm service is available at the new address.
I can help you get pricing and check availability. Could you share your first and last name, please?

messages: I can help you get pricing and check availability. Could you share your first and last name, please?

turns.content: Thanks Hannah. Is this for your nonprofit business location? When would you like a call—please give a preferred date, time, and your timezone?

messages: Thanks Hannah. Is this for your nonprofit business location? When would you like a call—please give a preferred date, time, and your timezone?

turns.content:
Yes, this is for our nonprofit office location.  

For the call, could we do this Thursday at 10:30 AM Central Time? If that’s not available, sometime Thursday afternoon Central would also work.
Great, you’re all set for Thursday, January 15, 2026, 10:30 AM CT. You’ll get a text with the phone number to call about five minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with today?

messages: Great, you’re all set for Thursday, January 15, 2026, 10:30 AM CT. You’ll get a text with the phone number to call about five minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with today?

turns.content:
Yes, two quick things:  

1) This is for moving service, not brand-new—will the person I speak with be able to handle a change of address and confirm continuity of our phone and internet numbers?  
2) Can you confirm you have service at our new address: 7420 Westhaven Blvd, Suite 320, Nashville, TN 37209?
Got it—our Business Class agent can handle a move, keep your phone and internet numbers active, and will verify service at 7420 Westhaven Blvd during the call.

messages: Got it—our Business Class agent can handle a move, keep your phone and internet numbers active, and will verify service at 7420 Westhaven Blvd during the call.

turns.content: Perfect, that’s exactly what I needed. I’ll wait for the text and be ready for the call on the 15th—thanks for your help!
